name: 施欣文
objective: In class we will do many activities involving reading, speaking, and writing. Be prepared to speak or act in front of the class. In some weeks I may assign skits and/or oral presentations in addition to the homework. I may also have you write short paragraphs in class. Depending on the purpose of this writing activity, I may or may not have you turn these in. (I do not tell you in advance whether I will collect a writing activity.)
schedule: See the hard copy or the e-learning site for week-by-week assignments.
scorePolicy:
GRADING CATEGORIES
Homework: 25%
Quizzes/Tests: 25%
Participation, Skits, and Presentations: 20%
Midterm: 15%
Final: 15%

These categories may be modified at my discretion, but the midterm and final will always be worth 30%.
